import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import {Context} from '../Context' import {IoIosTimer, IoMdEye, IoMdCheckmark, IoIosAirplane} from "react-icons/io"; import {FaDollarSign, FaRegCalendarAlt, FaEbay, FaFlagUsa} from 'react-icons/fa' import {FiPackage} from 'react-icons/fi' import {AiOutlineShoppingCart} from "react-icons/ai"; const AuctionBuyBox = (item) => { const {product, itemspec} = useContext(Context) const date = new Date() var months = ["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"]; return (

New

Quantity

$5.83

Price

Buy Now

${ (itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.CurrentPrice.Value : null}

Current Bid

Bid Must be Greater than $16

Watch Item

Add to Cart

6 bids

USPS First Class International Mail

Shipping Service

Item Ships ({months[date.getMonth()]}{date.getDate() + 1})

1 Day Handling

South Carolina, USA

Item Location

Ebay Money Back

60 Day Guarantee

) } export default AuctionBuyBox
